parameters.name: LogSource
parameters.description:
The log source. When this field is empty, query logs with the source set to computeNest and ros. Valid values:

computeNest : logs of the deployment and upgrade of the service instance.
application: logs generated by the application.
actionTrail: logs generated by ActionTrail.
compliancePack: Logs originating from the compliance package.
ros: Logs originating from ROS.
meteringDataï¼šLogs originating from the pay-as-you-go model.

parameters.name: Logstore
parameters.description: The Logstore. You must specify this parameter if you set LogSource to application.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: A pagination token. It can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If NextToken is empty, no next page exists.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: China (Hangzhou).
*   ap-southeast-1: Singapore.

parameters.name: ServiceInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the service instance.

parameters.name: SortOrder
parameters.description:
The order in which you want to sort the results. Valid values:

*   Ascending
*   (Default) Descending
